OKTA_TENANT.description: Okta tenant name, for example: myorg

OKTA_DOMAIN.description: Okta domain where your tenant is hosted, for example: okta.com

AUTH_SERVER_ID.description: Okta ID of the Authorization Server you are using for this application client.

REDIRECT_URI.description: Redirect URI for authorization code callback, for example: 'https://[yourapp].herokuapp.com/api/authorization-code/callback'

AUDIENCE.description: Audience configured in your authorization server

GOOGLE_IDP_ID.description: ID of Google IDP configured in Okta, if using social auth.

FACEBOOK_IDP_ID.description: ID of Facebook IDP configured in Okta, if using social auth.

SCOPES.description: Scopes needed for this application, e.g. openid profile https://oktacarrental.com/vehicles.read https://oktacarrental.com/book

OKTA_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID of this application in your Okta tenant.

OKTA_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client secret of this application in your Okta tenant.

NONCE.description: Nonce value for sign in widget

STATE.description: State value for sign in widget

VALIDATE_TOKEN_LOCAL.description: DO NOT CHANGE - forces the Node app to perform local validation on the access token after code exchange.

CHECK_AUTHENTICATED_LOCAL.description: DO NOT CHANGE - forces client app to check the Okta Sign In Widget session state between route changes.

PACKAGE_NAME.description: Package name of the iOS application that accompanies this demo app, for example: com.okta.joeb.oktapiamsample

IOS_CLIENT_ID.description: ClientID of the IOS app configured in Okta

DATA_SERVICES_MODE.description: DO NOT CHANGE - allows the app to use local JSON data instead of hitting the Apigee API gatway

API_GATEWAY_URL.description: Base URL of the Apigee API gateway you are using with this demo app. For example: https://joeburgett-eval-test.apigee.net

VEHICLES_API.description: API endpoint for vehicle inventory service, for example '/oktacarrental/v1/vehicles'

BOOK_API.description: API endpoint for vehicle booking/reservation service, for example '/oktacarrental/v1/book'
